-- | A package for precise decimal arithmatic using rationals.

--   A package for precise decimal arithmatic using rationals.
@package dfrac
@version 0.1.2.0

module Data.DFrac
data DFrac
DFrac :: Int -> Rational -> DFrac
places :: DFrac -> Int
number :: DFrac -> Rational
setPrec :: Int -> DFrac -> DFrac
instance Show DFrac
instance Read DFrac
instance RealFrac DFrac
instance Real DFrac
instance Fractional DFrac
instance Num DFrac
instance Ord DFrac
instance Eq DFrac
